explanations.machine learning: The abstract mentions the increased precision of machine learning models as a driver of AI growth, indicating the relevance of machine learning to the research.
explanations.deep learning: Generative AI, which is a focus of the paper, often relies on deep learning techniques, suggesting an indirect relevance of deep learning to the study.
explanations.Large Language Model: Generative AI, discussed in the paper, includes large language models as one of its prominent examples, making this keyword relevant.
explanations.LLM: LLM is an abbreviation for Large Language Model, which is relevant for the same reasons as the full term.
explanations.ChatGPT: ChatGPT is a well-known example of generative AI, which the paper focuses on, making this keyword relevant.
explanations.GPT-4: GPT-4 is another example of generative AI, similar to ChatGPT, and thus relevant to the paper's discussion on generative AI applications in finance.
